Yes, there are many essential oils that can help with stress and anxiety. Here are a few oils you can try:

1. Lavender: Lavender is one of the most popular essential oils for stress relief. It has a calming effect on the nervous system and can help reduce anxiety, promote relaxation, and improve sleep quality.

2. Bergamot: Bergamot oil has a citrusy scent and can help lift mood and reduce anxiety. It is also useful for promoting relaxation and reducing stress.

3. Frankincense: Frankincense oil has a woody, earthy scent and can help improve mood and reduce stress. It is also useful for promoting relaxation and reducing anxiety.

4. Ylang-Ylang: Ylang-Ylang oil has a sweet, floral scent, and can help reduce anxiety and promote relaxation. It is also useful for improving mood and reducing stress.

When using essential oils for stress relief, you can diffuse them or add a few drops to a carrier oil like coconut oil and use it as a massage oil. You can also add them to your bathwater or use them in a room spritz. As always, it's important to dilute essential oils properly and use them safely. If you have a medical condition or are pregnant or nursing, please seek the advice of a doctor before using any essential oils.
